description: RIA-837 Send Legal Representative review direction

value.explanation:
The respondent has replied to your appeal argument and evidence. You must now review their response.

Next steps
You have 5 days to review the response. If you want to respond to what the Home Office has said, you should email the case officer.

If you do not respond within 5 days, the case will automatically go to hearing.
